item.description:
2nd ANNUAL JEANS & BLING STEPPERS SET AT 10pm

The Set will begin immediately following the Walkin and Line Dance Workshop at 10 PM

This is the perfect atmosphere, and the perfect party.

Bring friends, tell everyone, the more the merrier.


Attire: Dress to impress JEANS AND BLING, BLING, BLING!


Cover: $10 (for set only)

Grille 831 Executive Chef Team will provide light buffet

Music: DJ C-Smooth and DJ Bright Eyes
Great sound system, excellent, friction-free dance floor
Step to the sounds of R & B, Soul, Neo-Soul, Smooth Jazz, Hip-Hop, and the Classics!

Ample free parking

See You There or B-Square!!!

group.name: The Original Steppers of Boston Inc. 2006

item.name: 2nd ANNUAL JEANS & BLING STEPPERS SET AT 10pm
